testcase.classname: Verify Search Item functionality on Myntra Home Page
testcase.name: To Verify When search product is available
testcase.system-out: Given User launches Myntra application......................................passed When User is on Myntra Home Page............................................passed When User Moved to Login Page...............................................passed When User logs in with "manishlalwani88@gmail.com" and "Mar@2091"...........passed Then Enters product "Mens Jeans" on search textbox..........................passed Then Products "Mens Jeans" are displayed on New Page........................passed Then User Selects Wishlist button for Required search.......................passed Then User Moves to Wishlist Page............................................passed Then User Moves item to Bag for Checkout....................................passed Then User Selects "30" from avaialble options...............................passed Then User Selects Done......................................................passed Then User Selects Bag to verify the item....................................passed
